title: 実績バッジ

[!--
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
▼CSS
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
--]
[[module CSS]]

/* Grid layout */

.left-grid {
    float: left;
    width: 49%;
    height: 110px;
}
.right-grid {
    float: right;
    width: 49%;
    height: 110px;
}

/* Mobile Media Query */
@media (max-width: 479px) { 
.left-grid,
.right-grid {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

/* Note Media Query */
@media (min-width: 480px) and (max-width: 580px) { 
.left-grid,
.right-grid {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

/* Tablet Media Query */
@media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 979px) {
.left-grid,
.right-grid {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

[[/module]]
author: tsucchii0301
